meanings.definition: A small, tailless rodent often kept as a pet.
meanings.sent1: The cavy in the cage is very friendly.
meanings.sent2: I love to cuddle my cavy after school.
meanings.sent3: The cavy tried to hide in my backpack!
meanings.sent4: Her room is like a playground for her cavy.
meanings.sent5: The cavy's squeaks filled the room with joy.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the cavy family of rodents.
meanings.sent1: The cavy family members are all so cute.
meanings.sent2: She studies the cavy species in her biology class.
meanings.sent3: The cavy party was the highlight of the year.

meanings.sent5: Her cavy-themed room was a cozy retreat.
